name: Question 1
values: What does your typical Friday night look like?

name: Question 2
values: Your friends usually go to you for _______.

name: Question 3
values: What would cheer you up the most?

name: Question 4
values: When things go wrong, you usually ________.
Flare up and then deal with it
Seek advice from a trusted friend

name: Question 5
values: Which is most important to you?
Being the first to know something

name: Result 1
values: Ladies and gentlemen, make way for the champion. Cool, calm and in control, you bring the awe and then some. Together with your favourite K-Pop crew like TWICE and IZ*ONE, you crank the noise up and bring the house down. You are K-Pop Daebak.

Based on my personality, I'd love to listen to #SpotifyKPopDaebak! spoti.fi/KPopDaebak

Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]

name: Result 2
values: More chilled than a bowl of naengmyeon and just as tasty, you’re laid back with a groovy K-R&B vibe. You go with the flow and love to kick back with your fam like Crush and DeVita. You are Trenchill K-R&B.

Based on my personality, I'd love to listen to #SpotifyTrenChillKRnB! spoti.fi/TrenChillKRnB

Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]

name: Result 3
values: They be callin’ and you be rollin’. From the streets to the stage, you always make your mark. Representing with your homies like Agust D and GRAY, you bring the sickest rhymes and the craziest beats. You are K-Hip-Hop +82.

Based on my personality, I'd love to listen to #SpotifyKHipHop82! spoti.fi/KHipHop82 

Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]

name: Result 4
values: A true friend, you always have your bestie's back - come rain or shine. Nothing can get in your way when you have your mind set on something. And when you get your girls together - from CHUNG HA to Solar - the boys better watch out. You are Girl Krush.

Based on my personality, I'd love to listen to #SpotifyGirlKrush! spoti.fi/GirlKrush

Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]

name: Result 5
values: Despite being the maknae, you got mad skills. You know what’s what, who’s who and where to find the freshest beats. You are always moving, kickin’ it with friends like BANG YE DAM and SECRET NUMBER. You are K-Pop Rising.

Based on my personality, I'd love to listen to #SpotifyKPopRising! spoti.fi/KPopRising

Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]

name: Result 6
values: You’re a sensitive soul and you’re not afraid to express it. You like to throw your hands in the air and wave ‘em around because you do care. You can happily spend all night jamming with your fellow rockers like DAY6 and HYUKOH. You are Cool K:IDs Rock.

Based on my personality, I'd love to listen to #SpotifyCoolKIDSRock! spoti.fi/CoolKIDSRock
